cancel.title: Purchase Cancelled
cancel.message: Your purchase was cancelled. No charges were made to your account.
cancel.tryAgain: You can try again anytime to unlock premium skins.
cancel.needHelp: Need help? Contact our support team.

success.title: Purchase Successful!
success.thankYou: Thank you for your purchase. Your premium skin is now available.
success.receiptSent: A receipt has been sent to your email address.

shakeInstructionsDesktop: Shake your device, press spacebar, or click/tap {item}!
